menu_reloadgame.message: Reloads the game and forces a fresh data collection

gui_clickwiki.message: Click to open the Wiki Page.

gui_screenshot_shot.message:
Click to make a screenshot of this section.
The screenshot will appear on the right.
Please note: only the visible area is captured!
You have to click the DAF2 icon in the Chrome menu, to enable this feature.

gui_screenshot_target.message:
Click to download the image.
You can right-click this image and select "Copy image" to copy it on the clipboard.

gui_screenshot_errorinfo.message:
First, you have to click the @DAF2@ icon in the Chrome menu.
This will enable the screenshot function until the page is closed.

Please, click the @DAF2@ icon then retry the screenshot.

gui_infodated.message: The information shown here was current and only valid as at '$VALID$'

gui_datafrompf.message: Data obtained from Pixel Federation's game files

about_data.message:
Last Data Snapshot: $TIME$
Game Site: $SITE$ ($PLATFORM$)
User Id: #$USERID$

about_nodata.message: No Game Data has been loaded yet, please load or refresh the game window

about_disclaimer.message:
DA Friends is 'Fan Code' and is neither endorsed nor supported by Pixel Federation, the authors of the game "Diggy's Adventure".
You use DA Friends at your own risk. It comes with no warranty or guarantee, neither explicit or implicit towards functionality or usability.
The author shall not be held liable for any damage or loss caused by its use.
By using this extension, you agree to these terms.

about_reset.message:
Your previous account's data was preserved.
To reset your data and use another account, click @RESET@

about_reset_ask_text.message:
Do you want to reset your data
so you can use another account?

about_reset_ok_text.message: Please reload Diggy's Adventure with the account you wish to use.

camp_unlock_one.message: Unlocking one slot will net $VALUE$ XP

camp_unlock_cost.message:
One slot can be unlocked with $VALUE$ gems
or with these materials:

neighbors_blocks.message: Blocks to clear in underground camp

neighbors_giftinfo.message: The date of the gift refers to the time when DAF first registered that gift, not the date it was sent.

neighbors_advancedfilterinfo.message: You can further filter your neighbours by the gifts they have sent in the last @DAYS@ days by selecting one or more gifts from the following list.

neighbors_gift_tooltip.message: Gifts received while DAF2 was active and recording.

neighbors_avgxpstats.message: Average gift value = $XP$ XP ($AVERAGE$ XP per neighbor/day)

friendship_scoretooltip.message:
Match confidence, as follows:
100 = Same Facebook id
99 = Manual match
95 = Same profile picture
90 = Same full name
80 = Same first name and last name
70 = Same first name and last name (reversed)
60 = Chinese characters match

friendship_actionignore.message:
This friend is regarded for the match
Click to ignore this friend during the match

friendship_actionregard.message:
This friend is ignored for the match
Click to regard this friend

friendship_actionmanual.message: Click to manually match this neighbour

friendship_actiondelete.message: Click to permanently delete this friend

friendship_matchplayertitle.message: Click here to cancel this match

friendship_unmatchedaccountsdetected.message: Disabled and/or unmatched accounts were detected.

friendship_unfriendinfo.message:
You can unfriend them from this page.

Please be aware that Facebook accounts may be temporary disabled and may be enabled at a later moment.

friendship_ghostfriendsdetected.message:
$NUM$ "ghost" friends were detected.
Would you like to remove them now?

friendship_confirmcollect.message:
Press YES to confirm, NO to try further.

You can close this window at any time
to cancel the operation.

friendship_filter_g.message: Friends and neighbours matched by image: $NUM$

friendship_collectpreamble.message: Here you can collect your Facebook friends and match it against your neighbours.

friendship_collectstandardinfo.message: This method is reliable, but very slow (it may take several minutes).

friendship_collectunmatchedinfo.message:
This method is the same as the 'Standard' method, but it will not collect friends.
Instead, it will show you all currently unmatched friends, so you can manually unfriend them.

friendship_collectalternateinfo.message: This method is super fast, but cannot detect disabled accounts.

friendship_collectbothinfo.message: This method combines the Alternate and Standard methods (Alternate first, then Standard).

friendship_ghostinfo.message: It can detect "ghost" friends and will offer the option to delete them.

friendship_collectmatchinfo.message:
This will perform the automatic match between your friends and neighbours.
Your friend list will not be refreshed.
Ignored friends and friends with a score greater than 90 are not automatically matched.
Matching will still be performed at the end of your friends collection.

friendship_confirmwarning.message:
This operation may take several minutes.

Please confirm that you want to proceed.

friendship_manualhelp.message: Please refresh the DAF2 page, go to "$FRIENDSHIP$" tab, click "$COLLECT$" and choose "$MATCH$"

friendship_manualmatchhelp.message: To match this neighbour you have to find a non matched friend and click on the cell where the symbol ⭐ is.

friendship_friendupdateinfo.message: The Facebook Friends List was updated on $DATE$

friendship_timewarning.message:
It appears that you have not performed a friend collection in a long time.
Please click the "$COLLECT$" button and choose the "$METHOD$" method.

godchild_next.message: To get an additional GC, you have to add $NUM$ more neighbours

godchild_next0.message: You have reached the maximum possible number of GC

godchild_next1.message: To get an additional GC, you have to add just one more neighbour

progress_energyinfo.message:
The energy shown here is estimated by multiplying the number of remaining tiles by the average tile cost.
The average tile cost is: completion bonus x 10 / total number of tiles

progress_playtime.message: You started playing $STARTED$ and have been playing for $DURATION$ (as at $NOW$)

rewardlinks_pasteAdd.message: Paste here the links to add, then press the "$CONFIRM$" button

rewardlinks_collectanyway.message: Would you like to open this link anyway?

rewardlinks_infocollected.message: This link has already been collected.

rewardlinks_infoexpired.message:
This link has expired.
Links are only valid for $NUM$ days.

rewardlinks_infonoself.message: This link is yours: self rewards are not valid.

rewardlinks_infobroken.message: This link is broken or not working.

rewardlinks_infomaxreached.message:
This link has been collected while the max daily limit was reached.
Links collected in this way are lost forever.

rewardlinks_infomayexceedlimit.message:
There are other rewards whose collection is pending.
This may exceed your daily limit.

rewardlinks_infoprobablyexpired.message:
This link is probably expired.
Links id are generated sequentially and this reward id is lower than the id of an expired reward.

rewardlinks_removelinksdays.message:
Remove non-collectable reward links older than @DAYS@ days.
This includes expired links and links already collected.
Links older than $NUM$ days are removed periodically.

rewardlinks_removeconfirm.message:
Links that will be removed: $NUM$
Removed links can no longer be added.

Proceed with the removal?

rewardlinks_resetcount.message: You can reset the "Next collection" information and proceed with this link anyway.

rewardlinks_resetexpired.message: You can reset the "Probably expired" information and proceed with this link anyway.

rewardlinks_shortenlinks_info1.message: Paste here the links to shorten/convert.

rewardlinks_shortenlinks_info2.message: Shortened links are shown below (duplicates are removed).

export_invalidexportdata.message: File is not a valid DAF export data for the current player!

equipment_sellout.message: Selling all unused items will net you $TOTAL$ coins (equipment = $EQUIP$ coins, decorations = $DECO$ coins)

equipment_gain_info.message: Gain is based on the minimum slot value in your camp

equipment_price_info.message:
The price shown here is not for this equipment,
but for the pack/offer that included this equipment.

repeat_time.message: Time when the mine will be ready again

dailyreward_stats.message: The daily reward is based on your current level ($LEVEL$) and region ($REGION$).

specialweek_free_premium_event.message: Free old event (you have to redeem it)

options_injectgame.message:
Enable DAF
Enable DAF in-game.
If not enabled, the following options have no effect

options_fullwindow.message:
Full window
Display game in full window

options_fullwindowheader.message:
Header
Display the page header when in full window

options_fullwindowside.message:
Side
Hide the sidebar (Facebook) when not in full window

options_fullwindowlock.message:
Lock full window
Prevents the game from exiting full window.

options_resetfullwindow.message:
Reset on load
Every time you load the game, "Full window" and "Full window - Side" are reset

options_resetfullwindow_warning.message: This option should be enabled if you experience problems loading the game.

options_fullwindowtimeout.message:
Auto full window
Automatically set full window when data has been loaded (DAF2 turns green)

options_gctable.message:
GC table
Show all neighbors with GC beneath the game

options_gctableregion.message:
Region
Use colors to mark a neighbor's region

options_nogcpopup.message:
No GC popups
No popups when collecting GC

options_autologin.message:
Portal auto-login
Automatically logins in Portal

options_keepdebugging.message:
Keep debugging
Use the debugger even after the game has loaded.
You may enable @SILENT@ to get rid of the "DAF2 is debugging" message

options_keepdebugging_warning.message: This is necessary to register incoming gifts while playing and to inspect a neighbor's camp.

options_disablealtguard.message:
Reset on alternate account
If you set this option, loading an alternate account will overwrite your current DAF2 data.

options_disablealtguard_warning.message: BEWARE: enable this option at your own risk!

options_rewardsclose.message:
Auto-close
Auto-close the page after the reward has been collected.

options_rewardscloseexceptgems.message:
Except gems
Do not auto-close when gem found.

options_rewardscloseexcepterrors.message:
Except errors
Do not auto-close when error found.

options_rewardssummary.message:
Add summary table
If the page is not auto-closed, add a summary table at the bottom.

options_linkgrabenabled.message:
Link Grabber
Enable the Link Grabber inside Facebook.
If not enabled, the following options have no effect.

options_linkgrabbutton.message:
Mouse button
Choose the mouse button that triggers the Link Grabber

options_linkgrabkey.message:
Optional key
Choose an optional key to press in addition to the mouse button

options_language.message:
Language
Choose the language to use

options_locale.message:
Localization
Used for formatting numbers, dates and lists

options_gamelanguage.message:
Game Language
Language for game's messages
